definition: to put about (a story, plan, threat etc)/to let it be known (esp. of threat or malicious story)/to threaten
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: On other occasions I threatened to pulverize it.
sentences.chinese: 在其他的時刻，我揚言要粉碎它。

sentences.english: He rebuked Lou, director of the stolen property, threatening to the wild man there.
sentences.chinese: 他斥責盧局長私吞公物，揚言要到野夫那裏告狀。

sentences.english: She has also threatened to impose a minimum wage on more industries where collective agreements are being side-stepped.
sentences.chinese: 她還揚言要對更多回避集體協議的產業設定最低工資。

sentences.english: The man in black threatens that he will wipe his father off.
sentences.chinese: 那個穿黑衣服的人揚言要殺他的父親。

sentences.english: She also threatened to sue Wang for damaging her reputation, insisting that he delete his post.
sentences.chinese: 她還揚言要起訴王寶強損其名譽，要求他刪除微博。

sentences.english: The Taliban are vowing to disrupt Thursday's balloting.
sentences.chinese: 塔利班揚言要擾亂星期四的選舉。

sentences.english: Pyongyang vowed to resume activity there by the end of this week.
sentences.chinese: 平壤方面揚言要在本週末恢復在那裏的活動。

sentences.english: The union arm-twisted the company into negotiating by threatening widespread strikes.
sentences.chinese: 工會揚言要舉行廣泛罷工，迫使公司進行談判。

sentences.english: Bell threatened to proceed against him for the recovery of the debt.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾揚言爲索債款要對他提起訴訟。

sentences.english: I threatened them with public exposure.
sentences.chinese: 我揚言要公開揭發他們。

sentences.english: Threatening marketing scheme is when a person threatens to do something in order to get the public's attention.
sentences.chinese: 脅從營銷策略是指一個人揚言做某事意圖公衆的注意。

sentences.english: He pledged tough penalties on corporations and chief officers who falsify accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他揚言將嚴懲作假帳的企業和主管人員。

sentences.english: The army is threatening to take over if civil unrest continues.
sentences.chinese: 軍方揚言如果內亂繼續就實行軍管。

sentences.english: The robber threatened to kill them if his demands were not met.
sentences.chinese: 強盜揚言若不滿足他的要求，就把他們都殺了。
